short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily scrape leads from your Apollo.io account and export to CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It allows you to scrape unlimited leads from Apollo and export as CSV.  

Go beyond basic contact details with access to email addresses, phone numbers, and social media accounts for direct communication.

You can also filter leads by job title, company size, industry, location, and more.
